text: Valayam is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Sibi Malayil, starring Murali and Manoj K. Jayan in the lead roles. http://spicyonion.com/title/valayam-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Murali as Sreedharan * Manoj K Jayan as Ravi * Parvathi Jayaram as Seetha * Suvarna Mathew as Radha * Aboobacker as Ammaan * Oduvil Unnikrishnan as Govindanaashaan * Mamukkoya as Kunjaali * Mala Aravindan as Dhivakaran * Mavelikkara Ponnamma as Ammini * Bindu Panicker as Vanaja * Beena Antony as Sumathy * Bobby Kottarakkara * Santhosh as Vareed ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films
title: Valayam (1992 film)
